name: SQUARE SHOOTER (EXPERIMENTAL PROJECT)
description:
PATTERN PROJECT is my study project that I did in my spare time to experiment with some Pattern concepts that I have been learning for a while. 

In this game you control a square that is flying horizontally, destroying other squares.

This project contains a Stage, two boss fighting, infinite lives, and etc.

Feel free to experiment.

I don't intend to finish this build because this build is only for testing the pattern, so don't pay too much attention to a fps drop that sometimes happens. 

Manual is included in the project.
